title: Nature & nurture interwoven

description: Episode number 5 of Series "The Worlds of childhood". Research in behaviour genetics, the concept of inheritability and data from twin studies are juxtaposed with observations about how parents change the future by changing the circumstances of children's lives. Observes urban Brazilian children meeting their country cousins in the context of the nature versus nurture debate.
